title: Counting Coup: A True Story of Basketball and Honor on the Little Big Horn
description: A noted journalist and author of Goat Brothers profiles a Montana high-school girls' basketball team--made up of Crow Indian and non-Native American girls from a rural town beset by racism, alcoholism, and other problems--that carries on its shoulders the dreams and hopes of a Native American tribe during their winning season. 50,000 first printing. Tour.
author: Larry Colton
